statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_collaborations;
SELECT campaign_name, collaboration_date FROM influencer_collaborations WHERE posts_published > 10;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_rate FROM influencer_collaborations WHERE collaboration_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM influencer_collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(posts_published) AS total_posts FROM influencer_collaborations GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM influencer_collaborations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, collaboration_date, engagement_rate FROM influencer_collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_name, posts_published FROM influencer_collaborations WHERE posts_published > 10 ORDER BY posts_published DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT influencer_id) AS total_influencers, collaboration_platform FROM influencer_collaborations GROUP BY collaboration_platform;
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement_rate FROM influencer_collaborations GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING AVG(engagement_rate) > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget < 5000
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 2.5
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget <= 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000 AND engagement_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE influencer_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions, revenue FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE revenue < 1000 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT Influencers.name, Campaigns.campaign_name, PerformanceMetrics.revenue FROM Influencers JOIN Campaigns ON Influencers.influencer_id = Campaigns.influencer_id JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON Campaigns.campaign_id = PerformanceMetrics.campaign_id WHERE PerformanceMetrics.revenue > 10000 ORDER BY PerformanceMetrics.revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 20

SELECT Campaigns.campaign_name, Campaigns.budget, Influencers.name FROM Campaigns JOIN Influencers ON Campaigns.influencer_id = Influencers.influencer_id WHERE Campaigns.budget > 5000 ORDER BY Campaigns.budget DESC

SELECT Influencers.name, SUM(PerformanceMetrics.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Influencers JOIN Campaigns ON Influencers.influencer_id = Campaigns.influencer_id JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON Campaigns.campaign_id = PerformanceMetrics.campaign_id GROUP BY Influencers.name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_id, collaboration_date FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_status = 'completed';
SELECT campaign_id, engagement_rate, roi FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE conversion_rate > 10;
SELECT * FROM Influencers LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT name, email, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT collaboration_id, influencer_id, campaign_id, collaboration_date, payment, collaboration_status FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM influencers ORDER BY influencer_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 1000 ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT post_content, post_likes FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date, post_likes FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT engagements.engagement_type, engagements.engagement_date, roi.roi_value FROM engagements INNER JOIN roi ON engagements.post_id = roi.campaign_id WHERE engagements.engagement_value > 500 ORDER BY engagements.engagement_date DESC;
